category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
You whose power is limitless and whose wisdom is perfect,
please arrange my life so that things don't hold me back,
discourage me,
or get in the way of Your work.
Stand between me and all conflict, so that no evil happens to me,
and no sin corrupts my gifts, my passion, or my accomplishments.
Help me to do what's right and not just follow my own foolish ideas.
Don't let me waste my time on work You won't bless,
so I can serve You without shame or failure.

Let me live in Your presence, under Your shadow,
where I'm completely safe from every danger—
the arrows that fly by day,
the sickness that moves in darkness,
the war of words,
the evil of bad intentions,
the pain of unkind talk,
the traps of bad friendships,
the dangers of being young,
the temptations of adulthood,
the sorrows of old age,
and the fear of death.

I am completely dependent on You for support, guidance, and comfort.
Hold me up by Your Spirit,
and don't let me be satisfied with just not failing;
help me to always be moving forward,
always excelling in the work You've given me to do.
Strengthen me by Your Spirit deep inside,
for every part of my Christian life.

I'm giving all my treasures to the safety of Your shadow—
my new identity in Christ,
my body, soul, talents, and character,
my successes, my family, my friends, my work,
my present, my future, and my ultimate purpose.

Take them. They are Yours, and I am Yours, now and forever.
